mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(a.data_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as dateTime, a.area_name as typeInfo, a.total_energy as totalEnergy, a.cusp_time_energy as cuspTimeEnergy, a.peak_time_energy as peakTimeEnergy, a.fair_time_energy as fairTimeEnergy, a.valley_time_energy as valleyTimeEnergy from ems_time_share_area_power_consumption a where a.corp_code = #{corpCode} and a.area_code = #{areaCode} and a.data_date BETWEEN #{dataDateStart} and #{dataDateEnd} and a.data_type = #{dataType} order by a.data_date desc
